OPAL TEAM","details":"The MarketPlace contract facilitates the buying and selling of GEM tokens within the ecosystem. It provides a platform for users to list their GEMs for sale, purchase GEMs using different payment methods, and manage the sale status of their GEMs. The contract integrates with the GemFactory and Treasury contracts to ensure transactions and handling of GEM tokens and payments. - TON: Users can pay with TON tokens, with a fee applied based on the configured fee rate. - WSTON: Users can also pay with WSTON tokens, which are transferred directly to the seller.this contract is meant to be deployed on Titan only (does not consider TON as a native token)*","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addAdmin(address)":{"details":"add admin","params":{"account":"address to add"}},"buyGem(uint256,bool)":{"details":"This function handles the purchase process, including payment and transfer of ownership.","params":{"_paymentMethod":"The payment method used. If true, the user purchases using L2 WSTON; if false, using TON.","_tokenId":"The ID of the token to be purchased."}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"initialize(address,address,uint256,address,address)":{"params":{"_gemfactory":"Address of the gem factory contract.","_ton":"Address of the TON token.","_tonFeesRate":"Fee rate for TON transactions.","_treasury":"Address of the treasury contract.","_wston":"Address of the WSTON token."}},"isAdmin(address)":{"details":"whether admin","params":{"account":"address to check"}},"pause()":{"details":"Can only be called by the owner when the contract is not paused."},"putGemForSale(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"The GEM must be approved for transfer for the marketplace contract before it can be listed.","params":{"_price":"The price at which the GEM is listed.","_tokenId":"The ID of the token to be listed for sale."}},"putGemListForSale(uint256[],uint256[])":{"details":"Each GEM must be approved for transfer by the marketplace contract before it can be listed.","params":{"prices":"An array of prices corresponding to each GEM.","tokenIds":"An array of token IDs to be listed for sale."}},"removeAdmin()":{"details":"remove admin"},"removeGemForSale(uint256)":{"details":"Only the owner of the GEM can remove it from sale.","params":{"_tokenId":"The ID of the token to be removed from sale."}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"setDiscountRate(uint256)":{"details":"The discount rate must be less than 100%.","params":{"_tonFeesRate":"New discount rate for TON fees."}},"setGemFactory(address)":{"params":{"_gemFactory":"New gemFactory proxy address"}},"setStakingIndex(uint256)":{"params":{"_stakingIndex":"New staking index."}},"setTon(address)":{"params":{"_ton":"New ton token address"}},"setWston(address)":{"params":{"_wston":"New wston token address"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"transfer owner","params":{"newOwner":"new owner address"}},"unpause()":{"details":"Can only be called by the owner when the contract is paused."}},"title":"MarketPlace","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"buyGem(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Allows a user to buy a GEM listed on the marketplace."},"initialize(address,address,uint256,address,address)":{"notice":"Initializes the marketplace contract with the given parameters."},"pause()":{"notice":"Pauses the contract, preventing certain actions."},"putGemForSale(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Lists a GEM for sale on the marketplace."},"putGemListForSale(uint256[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Lists multiple GEMs for sale on the marketplace."},"removeGemForSale(uint256)":{"notice":"Removes a GEM from being listed for sale on the marketplace."},"setDiscountRate(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the discount rate for TON fees."},"setGemFactory(address)":{"notice":"updates the gemfactory proxy address"},"setStakingIndex(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the staking index. note that this function is mainly used by the oracle each time a deposit is made on L1WSTON contract."},"setTon(address)":{"notice":"updates the ton token address"},"setWston(address)":{"notice":"updates the wston token address"},"unpause()":{"notice":"Unpauses the contract, allowing actions to be buyGem(uint256,bool).details: This function handles the purchase process, including payment and transfer of ownership.

params._paymentMethod: The payment method used. If true, the user purchases using L2 WSTON; if false, using TON.
params._tokenId: The ID of the token to be purchased.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params._gemfactory: Address of the gem factory contract.

pause().details: Can only be called by the owner when the contract is not paused.

putGemForSale(uint256,uint256).details: The GEM must be approved for transfer for the marketplace contract before it can be listed.

params._price: The price at which the GEM is listed.
params._tokenId: The ID of the token to be listed for sale.

putGemListForSale(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Each GEM must be approved for transfer by the marketplace contract before it can be listed.

params.prices: An array of prices corresponding to each GEM.
params.tokenIds: An array of token IDs to be listed for sale.

removeGemForSale(uint256).details: Only the owner of the GEM can remove it from sale.

params._tokenId: The ID of the token to be removed from sale.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setDiscountRate(uint256).details: The discount rate must be less than 100%.

params._tonFeesRate: New discount rate for TON fees.

unpause().details: Can only be called by the owner when the contract is paused.

buyGem(uint256,bool).notice: Allows a user to buy a GEM listed on the marketplace.

initialize(address,address,uint256,addre.notice: Initializes the marketplace contract with the given parameters.

pause().notice: Pauses the contract, preventing certain actions.

putGemForSale(uint256,uint256).notice: Lists a GEM for sale on the marketplace.

putGemListForSale(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Lists multiple GEMs for sale on the marketplace.

removeGemForSale(uint256).notice: Removes a GEM from being listed for sale on the marketplace.

setDiscountRate(uint256).notice: Sets the discount rate for TON fees.

setStakingIndex(uint256).notice: Sets the staking index. note that this function is mainly used by the oracle each time a deposit is made on L1WSTON contract.

unpause().notice: Unpauses the contract, allowing actions to be performed.
